title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (UCCJEA) Forms, UCCJEA-8 - Request for assistance or records - UCCJEA
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (UCCJEA) Forms, UCCJEA-8 - Request for assistance or records - UCCJEA
State Regulations
D.R.L. §§ 75-j, 75-k Form
UCCJEA-8
(Request for Assistance and/or

Records--UCCJEA)
8/2002

At a term of the Family Court of the State
of New York, held in and for the County of, at

New York on,. PRESENT: Hon. Judge
________
In the Matter of a Proceeding for

Custody Visitation

Enforcement Modification Registration of
an order of Custody Visitation under the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and

Enforcement Act [Domestic Relations Law Art. 5-A] Docket No. REQUEST FOR
ASSISTANCE
RECORDS
--UCCJEA
Petitioner
-against-
Respondent
________
TO: COURT, COUNTY, STATE OF
1. A petition has been filed in this Court
pursuant to the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act [New

York State Domestic Relations Law Article 5-A] relating to the [check
applicable box(es)]: custody visitation enforcement modification registration
of an Order of Custody Visitation involving the following child(ren): Name(s) Date(s) of Birth
2. Pursuant to Sections 75-k(1) and
75-k(2) of the New York State Domestic Relations Law, this Court requests that
you provide the following assistance [check applicable box(es)]: hold a hearing to adduce evidence in
accordance with procedures of your state. order the following party or person having
physical custody of the child(ren) to produce the child(ren) as follows
[specify]: order the following person to produce and
give evidence at the hearing [specify]: order that an evaluation be made of the
following home and the child(ren) [specify]: Form UCCJEA-8 Page 2
3. Pursuant to Sections 75-k(1)(d) and
75-k(4) of the New York State Domestic Relations Law, this Court requests that
you forward to this Court certified copies of records from the following
proceeding(s) [specify title of proceeding, docket number and date, if
available]: These records shall include [check
applicable box(es)]: pleadings; orders, judgments and decrees; transcript of the record of the
hearing; evidence adduced, including documents and
exhibits; social studies or evaluations
prepared; other pertinent documents
[specify]: Pursuant to Section 75-j(3) of the New

York State Domestic Relations Law, these records may be transmitted to this

Court by: facsimile to [specify name and fax
#]: e-mail to [specify name and e-mail
address]: other [specify]: 4. Pursuant to New York State Domestic

Relations Law § 75-k(3), travel and other necessary expenses incurred in
connection with this request shall be assessed against the parties according to

New York State Law as follows [specify, delete is inapplicable]: Dated: _______________
Judge of the Family

Court

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Uniform Child

Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (UCCJEA) Forms, UCCJEA-8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
